Description: EXXOMOVE GmbH focuses on providing solutions for individuals with limited arm and hand mobility. Their core products include the BATEO robotic arm and the CARBONHAND hand orthosis. BATEO aims to restore the ability to perform everyday tasks for people with restricted arm movement, while CARBONHAND offers enhanced grip strength and endurance for those with weak hands. The company targets individuals with conditions such as Arthrogryposis multiplex congenitas, high paraplegia, or advanced muscular dystrophies. EXXOMOVE attends rehabilitation and mobility trade fairs like REHACARE and REHAB to showcase their products and connect with potential users and partners. They offer consultations and trials of their products to demonstrate their benefits and improve the quality of life for their customers. Their mission is to enable a more self-determined and independent life through smart arm and hand mobility solutions.
Sales Line: I was reviewing your services, and it stood out how strongly you're positioned in assistive technology for individuals with limited mobility. Your approach reminds me of another company we recently supported; they were equally dedicated to automating processes to improve patient outcomes, and together we significantly boosted their sales. Would it be unreasonable to explore how we achieved that and whether something similar could apply to your team?
Key Resonating Themes: Industry: Healthcare Technology / HealthTech; Automation of processes; Target Audience: Healthcare Sector (B2B)
